Rulings.Edison:
●The controller (not the owner) of Guardian Angel Joan increases his/her Life Points.
●When Guardian Angel Joan is destroyed while battling a monster with equal ATK (such as another Guardian Angel Joan), her effect is NOT activated because Guardian Angel Joan has been removed from the field.
●When Guardian Angel Joan attacks Cyber Jar, Guardian Angel Joan's effect is not activated because she is destroyed before Cyber Jar is sent to the GY.

Rulings.Base: 1. The controller (not the owner) of "Guardian Angel Joan" increases his/her Life Points.\n2. When "Guardian Angel Joan" is destroyed while battling a monster with equal ATK (such as another "Guardian Angel Joan"), her effect is NOT activated because "Guardian Angel Joan" has been removed from the field.\n3. When "Guardian Angel Joan" attacks "Cyber Jar", the effect of "Guardian Angel Joan" is not activated because she is destroyed before "Cyber Jar" is sent to the GY.

PSCT.Edison: ① If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK (even if it is no longer in the GY).
